div.marquee: There will be a Special Board Meeting on Monday, April 27th, at 7:00 PM. This meeting will be on Zoom. Please contact the District Office at 548-2259 for an invitation link.

section.p: School Closure Extended: Governor Mark Gordon and State Health Officer Dr. Alexia Harrist have extended the three existing statewide health orders through April 30 to slow community transmission of coronavirus (COVID-19) and protect lives. The Governor has also issued a directive requiring any individual coming to Wyoming from another state or country for a non-work-related purpose to immediately self-quarantine for 14 days. Under this directive, Big Horn County School District #2 has closed school for students beginning Monday, March 16, 2020 and will remain closed through April 30, 2020. Select the link to our dedicated Coronavirus Disease 19 (COVID-19) page for important information and updates.

h1.a: Big Horn County Emergency Crisis Team Survey

section.p: In order for our Big Horn County Emergency Crisis Team to create a database of skills and equipment available in our area, we are asking Big Horn County residents to please complete a survey (select link above). All information will be kept confidential and will only be shared with the Crisis Team. The information collected will be used to help meet the needs of our community and county during a crisis. If you have any questions regarding the survey please contact the school nurse at medespain@bgh2.org. Thank you for your help.

BGH2 is providing a free breakfast and lunch for any student 18 and under during the school closure. If you are not already on the list to receive meals, please follow the above link to fill out a form and we will get your student(s) added to our list.
